p: Polyethylene (PE) film was prepared from Sultan Chap Co. (Karaj, Iran), with thicknesses of 0.02 ± 5.7 × 10 –4 (mm). Carvacrol and menthol (CAS 64‐17‐5 EMSURE ® Reag. Ph Eur) and Mueller Hinton Broth (MHB) (110,293—Merck Millipore) were purchased from the Merck (Darmstadt, Germany). E. coli O157:H7, S. aureus ATCC 6,538 , Listeria innocua, and Saccharomyces cervicea were also collected from the Institute of Science Research and Technology (Tehran, Iran). All other chemicals used were of analytical grade.
